body:
fixes #12896 

Changes in the AMD models:
- `zen` (17h family) derives directly from `x86_64` and is not compatible with any of the 15h family
- Added more features that are peculiar of the 15h family

Added a unit test for `piledriver` using a `/proc/cpuinfo` from [here](https://www.redhat.com/archives/vfio-users/2015-August/msg00111.html)
title: AMD: fix architecture hierarchy (zen)
